arrangements

    • Benchmarking 'arrangements'

    Benchmarking ‘arrangements’

    The goal of this document is to compare the performances of some of the existing packages for generating combinations, permutations and partitions.

    • gtools 3.5.0
    • combinat 0.0-8
    • multicool 0.1-10
    • partitions 1.9-19
    • permute 0.9-4
    • permutations 1.0-2
    • RcppAlgos 0.2.5
    • iterpc: it is omitted as arrangements is thought of a replacement of iterpc.
    suppressPackageStartupMessages({
    library(microbenchmark)
    library(gtools)
    library(combinat)
    library(multicool)
    library(partitions)
    library(permute)
    library(permutations)
    library(RcppAlgos)
    library(arrangements)
    gtools.permutations = gtools::permutations
    gtools.combinations = gtools::combinations
    ucombn = utils::combn
})

    gtools::permutations, gtools::combinations and utils::combn are renamed because they are being overwritten by arrangements::permutations, arrangements::combinations and combinat::combm respectively.

    Permutations

    Permutation of 7 items

    microbenchmark(
    gtools = gtools.permutations(7, 7),
    multicool = allPerm(initMC(1:7)),
    partitions = partitions::perms(7),
    permuate = allPerms(7),
    permutations = allperms(7),
    RcppAlgos = permuteGeneral(7, 7),
    arrangements = permutations(7),
    times = 10,
    unit = "relative"
)
    ## Unit: relative
##          expr     min      lq    mean  median      uq    max neval
##        gtools  838.14  636.24  92.012  465.20  357.57 15.607    10
##     multicool 1765.73 1446.62 211.384 1043.35  924.81 34.656    10
##    partitions    1.86    1.70   0.486    1.29    1.14  0.320    10
##      permuate 1108.30  857.08 116.606  612.06  453.01 16.122    10
##  permutations 3228.27 2465.32 337.909 1762.99 1320.27 47.508    10
##     RcppAlgos    2.64    2.02   0.453    1.43    1.68  0.202    10
##  arrangements    1.00    1.00   1.000    1.00    1.00  1.000    10

    5-Permutation of 7 items

    microbenchmark(
    gtools = gtools.permutations(7, 5),
    RcppAlgos = permuteGeneral(7, 5),
    arrangements = permutations(7, 5),
    unit = "relative"
)
    ## Unit: relative
##          expr   min     lq    mean median     uq    max neval
##        gtools 193.4 189.90 117.399 147.96 145.42 6.6188   100
##     RcppAlgos   1.2   1.19   0.844   1.11   1.08 0.0595   100
##  arrangements   1.0   1.00   1.000   1.00   1.00 1.0000   100

    Permutation of multiset

    f <- c(2, 1, 2, 1, 2)
x <- rep(1:5, f)
microbenchmark(
    multicool = allPerm(initMC(x)),
    RcppAlgos = permuteGeneral(1:5, freqs = f),
    arrangements = permutations(freq = f),
    unit = "relative"
)
    ## Unit: relative
##          expr     min      lq   mean median      uq   max neval
##     multicool 1638.70 1623.61 976.75 1339.9 1198.48 168.3   100
##     RcppAlgos    1.00    1.00   1.00    1.0    1.00   1.0   100
##  arrangements    1.05    1.12   1.01    1.1    1.03   1.3   100

    K-Permutation of multiset

    f <- c(2, 1, 2, 1, 2)
x <- rep(1:5, f)
microbenchmark(
    multicool = allPerm(initMC(x)),
    RcppAlgos = permuteGeneral(5, 6, freqs = f),
    arrangements = permutations(freq = f, k = 6),
    unit = "relative"
)
    ## Unit: relative
##          expr     min      lq    mean  median      uq     max neval
##     multicool 2624.04 2569.80 1756.61 1779.34 1732.86 180.473   100
##     RcppAlgos    1.26    1.27    1.13    1.16    1.17   0.661   100
##  arrangements    1.00    1.00    1.00    1.00    1.00   1.000   100

    Combinations

    7-Combinations of 15 items

    microbenchmark(
    gtools = gtools.combinations(15, 7),
    combinat = combn(15, 7),
    utils = ucombn(15, 7),
    RcppAlgos = comboGeneral(15, 7),
    arrangements = combinations(15, 7),
    unit = "relative"
)
    ## Unit: relative
##          expr    min     lq   mean median    uq    max neval
##        gtools 312.02 271.91 232.89 264.71 231.2 54.660   100
##      combinat  63.05  54.31  61.21  56.15  54.3 52.765   100
##         utils  84.58  72.73  66.11  74.11  70.0 11.273   100
##     RcppAlgos   1.00   1.00   1.00   1.00   1.0  1.000   100
##  arrangements   1.23   1.21   1.14   1.19   1.2  0.482   100

    Combinations with replacement of 9 items

    microbenchmark(
    gtools = gtools.combinations(9, 6, repeats.allowed = TRUE),
    RcppAlgos = comboGeneral(9, 6, repetition = TRUE),
    arrangements = combinations(9, 6, replace = TRUE),
    unit = "relative"
)
    ## Unit: relative
##          expr     min     lq   mean median      uq     max neval
##        gtools 253.066 246.70 205.06 196.51 191.541 162.501   100
##     RcppAlgos   1.000   1.00   1.00   1.00   1.000   1.000   100
##  arrangements   0.993   1.01   1.01   1.02   0.993   0.778   100

    Combinations of multiset

    f <- c(2, 1, 2, 1, 2, 2, 1, 2)
x <- rep(1:8, f)
microbenchmark(
    RcppAlgos = comboGeneral(8, 6, freqs = f),
    arrangements = combinations(freq = f, k = 6),
    unit = "relative"
)
    ## Unit: relative
##          expr  min   lq mean median  uq   max neval
##     RcppAlgos 1.11 1.09 1.07   1.09 1.1 0.747   100
##  arrangements 1.00 1.00 1.00   1.00 1.0 1.000   100

    Partitions

    Partitions of 30

    microbenchmark(
    partitions = parts(30),
    arrangements = partitions(30),
    unit = "relative"
)
    ## Unit: relative
##          expr  min   lq mean median   uq    max neval
##    partitions 3.37 3.29 1.21   3.54 5.82 0.0536   100
##  arrangements 1.00 1.00 1.00   1.00 1.00 1.0000   100

    Partitions of 50 into 10 parts

    microbenchmark(
    partitions = restrictedparts(50, 10),
    arrangements = partitions(50, 10),
    unit = "relative"
)
    ## Unit: relative
##          expr  min lq mean median   uq max neval
##    partitions 17.7 18 17.7   17.6 15.5  22   100
##  arrangements  1.0  1  1.0    1.0  1.0   1   100
